item.title: Swiss National Bank takes leap with 50-basis-point interest rate cut amid franc strength
item.description: The Swiss National Bank on Thursday cut its key interest rate by 50 basis points, exceeding expectations of a smaller trim.

item.title: India's inflation slows from 14-month high, raising hopes of interest rate cut under new governor
item.description: The country's inflation rate reading comes after India had missed growth expectations for its fiscal second quarter

item.title: European Central Bank set to deliver final rate cut of the year
item.description: It appears unlikely that a 0.5 percentage-point rate cut could be in store, despite headline inflation having settled near the ECB's 2% target.

item.title: European markets tread water ahead of expected rate cut from the European Central Bank
item.description: European markets moved slightly lower Thursday as regional investors await the last monetary policy decision of the year from the European Central Ban...
